textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   StephenG If you do want a wide aperture lens then consider the 50mm f1.8. Cheap and sharp and a good choice to dabble in wide aperture shooting. Can be found used for what, in lens terms, is buttons. The kit lenses ( 18-55 and 55-250 ) are good sharp lenses suited to general use. They're also cheap. I'm in agreement with this.
